text: Spark of Life may refer to: * "Spark of Life" (CSI), a fifth-season episode of the American crime drama CSI: Crime Scene Investigation * Spark of Life (novel), a 1952 novel by Erich Maria Remarque * "That Spark of Life", a 1943 novel by Pavel Bazhov *Spark of Life (album), a 2014 album by Marcin Wasilewski
title: Spark of Life
